import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import store from "../../Redux/Store" import "./ProductDescriptionPage.css" import { addCart, addWishlist } from '../../Redux/Cart/Action' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import { SyncLoader } from "react-spinners" export default function ProductDescriptionPage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((store) => store.cart.cart) const wishlist = useSelector((store) => store.cart.wishlist) useEffect(() => { if (id) axios.get(`https://alok-mern.herokuapp.com/product/id/${id}`).then((res) => setData(res.data)) }, []) const handleAddBag = () => { console.log(data) dispatch(addCart(data)) // alert("Product Added To Cart Successfully") toast.success("Product Added To Cart Successfully") } const handleAddWishlist = () => { console.log("list") dispatch(addWishlist(data)) alert("Product Added To Wishlist Successfully") } return (
{/*

Product Details

navigate("/")}>Home | Category

*/} { data ?

PRODUCT DETAILS

{data ? data.name : ""}

Brand :- {data ? data.brand_name : ""}

{data ? data.product_details[0] : ""}

Select Size :-

{data ? data.sizes[0] : 0}

{data ? data.sizes[1] : 0}

{data ? data.sizes[2] : 0}

{data ? data.sizes[3] : 0}

{data ? data.sizes[4] : 0}

Rating:- {data ? data.customer_rating : 0}

{data ? data.price.sp : 0}

{data ? data.price.mrp : 0}

( {data ? data.price.discount : 0}% OFF )

:
}
) }
